name: test-omg-work
author: danielseehausen
description: Graph data structure with conditional edges via 'slots' on nodes. Intended to represent physical and virtual functionalities on a device.

scripts.lint-diff: LIST=$(git diff-index --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep .*\.[jt]sx\\? | grep -v json); if [ "$LIST" ]; then eslint $LIST; fi
scripts.lint-diff-and-fix: LIST=$(git diff-index --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep .*\.[jt]sx\\? | grep -v json); if [ "$LIST" ]; then eslint --fix $LIST; fi
